ProjectTitle: “Righting” the Black Atlantic: Expatriate African American Writing for an Age of Involuntary Displacement
InitialFeedbackHistory:
30/06/2023
Data: who are the participants of the online expert meetings that you record, are these part of the project? If you interview external experts you will process personal data and need to register this in de KU Leuven processing of personal data register, please consult https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index, contact pret@kuleuven.be if you have questions.  
Storage/preservation: Storing data on an external hard drives or laptops is not very secure, can you store all datasets on onedrive? Consult the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Consider sharing data underlying your publications in a data repository, for example KU Leuven RDR, for more information see:  https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
